title: 4K Video Downloader 4.0.0.2016 + Patch
description:
4K Video Downloader is an application built specifically for helping you download your favorite video's from different online platforms. The application offers uswers the possibility to save the video's to FLV, MP4, MKV or 3GP format.



It boasts an intuitive and clean layout that allows users to perform several actions on the go. You can paste the URL's directly into the main panel and seklect the video quality, according with it's stream type.



Moreover, it is possible to make the program extract the audio from the video file and you can choose the output format and destination. You can save the audio files to the following file formats: MP3, M4A or OGG.



The application manages to download an entire playlist or you can grab the selected video. It also offers time estimation for completing the job, and at the end of downloading process you can view details about the size, file format asnd length of the video file.



4K Video Downloader provides a smart mode for helping you grab video files in the easiest way possible. You are required to choose the file format, quality and output destination. Once you have configured the parameters, the application is able to apply the settings to all your downloads.



During my testing of this application I have noticed that the program manages to grab video files and extract audio quickly and without errors. It also provides good image and sound quality.



To sum things up, 4K Video Downloader proves to be a decent tool that realy can help you download video files quickly and easily. Thanks to it's clean interface and overasll simplicity, it can be mastered by beginners and experts alike.



Features:

- Download entire playlists and channels from YouTube and save them in MP4, MKV, M4A, MP3, 3G and FLV, generate .m3u file for playlists

- Download video in HD 1080p, HD 720p or 4K quality and enjoy high dimension video on your HD TV, iPad or other devices

- Advanced subtitles download, select if you would like to have .srt file or embedd subtitles in video file to watch it on your Mac for example

- Activate "Smart Mode" in order to apply the selected settings to all your downloads, easy and fast

- Download video in 3D format, you will find a small special icon among available formats after video parsing. It's really impressive to watch live shows and cartoons in 3D

- Download embedded YouTube video's from any web pages, just copy/paste the link and the program will find the source of download

- Download video and audio from YouTube, Vimeo, SoundCloud, Flicr,and DailyMotion

- Use 4K Video Downloader on your PC, Mac or Linux, doesn't matter what OS you prefer



OS: Windows/Mac OS/Linux

Language: Multilingual

Update Release: March 1, 2016



This torrent contains the following installers:


- Microsoft Windows

- Microsoft aWindows Portable

- Mac OS X 10.7 or later

- Ubuntu 32-bit

- Ubuntu 32-bit Portable

- Ubuntu 64-bit

- Ubuntu 64-bit Portable

- Patch 4K Video Downloader 3x
